name: Lichun

wellness.nutrition: Increase greens, lighter proteins, hydrate consistently.
wellness.rest: Sleep before 11pm, reduce evening screen time.

usLifestyleTip: Balance indoor heating with humidifiers; plan daylight breaks for remote work schedules.

name: Yushui

wellness.nutrition: Add warm broths and ginger to counter dampness.
wellness.rest: Wind down earlier, use blue-light filters.
wellness.movement: Light cardio or dance sessions to release sluggish Water.

usLifestyleTip: Schedule tax prep and admin tasks while energy is grounded; use humidifiers for home offices.

name: Jingzhe

wellness.nutrition: Introduce sprouts and citrus to cleanse Liver Qi.
wellness.movement: HIIT or energizing workouts to channel rising Fire.

usLifestyleTip: Plan spring cleaning; declutter digital files and inboxes.

name: Chunfen

wellness.movement: Outdoor runs or biking to sync with daylight.

usLifestyleTip: Reset meetings to align with longer daylight hours; schedule brainstorming retreats.
